name: Ballerina Life 3D
description:
Ballerina Life 3D is a fun, asmr game where you master the ballerina pose in order to become a superstar. Enjoy the relaxing avatar behavior that you can easily pose, play, and even makeover. Just move her arms and legs into the correct ballet position. Tap, tap, tap and your

In the initial levels of this fun simulation game, you exercise in simple positions and stretches during practice at the dance studio. You will seriously have so much fun living a ballerina life. And with more exercise, your ballerina will transform into a superstar and amaze the crowd as a professional dancer. You can even DIY her shoes and give them a full makeover. Ballerina Life 3D is extremely ASMR and also creative. You can never get enough!

The magic never ends with ballerina life! You will never play another simulation game ever again!

To opt out of CrazyLabs sales of personal information as a California resident, please visit our Privacy Policy: https://crazylabs.com/app
